name: ModifyDashboardTemplate
description:
Update a Datadog dashboard template.

Call this tool to update an existing dashboard template within a specified Datadog project. Use this when you need to modify the details or configuration of a dashboard template.

parameters.name: dashboard_template_uuid
parameters.description: A UUID string that identifies the dashboard template to be modified.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this dashboard template.

parameters.name: project_identifier
parameters.description: The unique Project ID for accessing a specific Datadog project. Retrieve this by calling /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: dashboard_update_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing updated details for the dashboard template, including fields like 'id', 'template_name', 'dashboard_description', 'dashboard_filters', 'tags', 'tiles', 'variables', 'deleted', 'created_at', 'created_by', 'image_url', 'team_id', 'scope', and 'availability_contexts'.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the PostHog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this dashboard template.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this dashboard template.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
